creator: Irvine, Acheson Gosford, 1837-1916. (author)
description: Irvine, Acheson Gosford: 1837-1916. Born Quebec; major in 2nd Battalion of Quebec Rifles in Red River expeditionary force, 1870; appointed commanding officer of Provisional Battalion of Rifles in Manitoba, 1871; appointed assistant commissioner of NWMP, 1875; commissioner of NWMP, 1880-1886 (Wallace, Dictionary of Canadian biography). // At head of title: "Confidential." Covers Irvine's activities from March 18 to May 23, 1885.
subject: Rebellions and Regimental Histories--Saskatchewan Rebellion
